overview: This DVD is for instructional and informational purposes only.  In this DVD, you will find 90 minutes of footage showing:  color work  all black work  and cover up work.  Also, it will explain:  stencil making  machine set-up  and all the other basics of tattooing  You will be one-on-one with the artist, and you will learn the basic techniques of the Art of Tattooing.
title: The Art of Tattooing
